bibl.title: Carmina Archilochi. The Fragments of Archilochus. Translated from the Greek.
bibl.seg: Davenport Guy, Carmina Archilochi. The Fragments of Archilochus. Translated from the Greek.
Berkeley and Los Angeles, University of California Press, 1964, xxi-104 pp.

C.R. par A.P. Burnett, CP 60 (1965) pp. 49-51. - Frederick M. Combellack, CW 58 (1964) pp. 13-14. - W.B. Stanford, Hermathena 99 (1964) p. 108. - A.D. Fitton Brown, JHS 85 (1965) pp. 173-174. - Jean Pouilloux, REA 66 (1964) p. 404. - Herman Van Looy, AntCl 34 (1965) p. 216.
